i am a traveling encyclopedia salesman.
i enjoy this type of activist work , as my job is not very personally fulfilling.
my parents were scientists.

participant_2.background:
I recall spending long hours in the woods with my dog, chasing rabbits and playing hide-and-seek.
i am hoping to move to australia soon to marry my boyfriend.
i am a graduate student.
i am a humble baker.
I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.

content.text: Hi there! I'm doing great. How about you?
I'm doing good, thanks! I'm a traveling encyclopedia salesman.
Really? That's interesting! What's that like?
It's fun! I get to meet a lot of people and learn about different cultures.
I bet! I love learning about different cultures. I'm a graduate student studying anthropology.
Oh that's great! What are you specializing in?
I'm specializing in Indigenous Australian cultures.
That's so cool! I've always been fascinated by Aboriginal culture.
It's amazing! I'm hoping to move to Australia soon to marry my boyfriend and continue my research.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll love it there.
Thanks! I'm excited to start a new chapter in my life.
